data.title: Seaver-Brown Funeral Service
data.meta_description: Seaver-Brown Funeral Service provides complete funeral services in Marion, VA. Call us today for pre-planning or custom planning options
data.text:
Seaver-Brown Funeral Service and Crematory is family owned and operated by the Frazier family and has built an excellent reputation for serving families with compassion and integrity since 1844. We provide a unique combination of traditional values along with progressive products and a variety of services.

The families we serve are not just our clients they are our neighbors and friends. Just as each life follows its own path, deciding how you would like to remember and honor your loved one is truly a personal journey. Whether you prefer a simple private gathering, full traditional funeral, cremation or a non-traditional service, we will assist you with all of your options.

The loss of a loved one can leave you with a lot of unanswered questions, feelings of stress and anxiety and grief that makes events difficult to handle. The experienced professionals at Seaver-Brown will guide you through the aspects of the funeral service with compassion, diginity and respect.
